name: r3-workspace
description: R3 Project Workspace - Central configuration and testing

scripts.deploy-config: npm run sync-config && cd ../r3-frontend && git add -A && git commit -m 'chore: sync config from workspace' && git push && cd ../r3-backend && git add -A && git commit -m 'chore: sync config from workspace' && git push
scripts.update-config: npm run sync-config && npm run deploy-config

author: R3 Team
